page.title: 12INDUSTRIAL ESTATE 2
page.content: oil coolers and compressors. They buy- in the raw material, mainly steel, and then mke custom made equipment. They are suppliers to the Ministry of Defence, Ford, Renault, Vauxhall, and export to Switzerland and China. They have also supplied motor pumps to brewers, like Whitbread and Guinness. Amongst the other firms on the estate are, a maker of snooker tables, employing between 3 and 6 workers. A TV repair workshop with 3 staff, and a carpentary-joinery concern, who specialise in supplying wood to local building firms and employ 6 people. Most of the firms were started by one or two people, and frequently without a government grant of any kind. Some like 'Occo' are well- established, while others are clearly of a more marginal type. Heath Hill will clearly remain a small estate.
